Grain.Do: Barley (1/2 cup cooked), Quinoa (1/2 cup cooked), Oats (1/2 cup cooked), Basmati Rice (1/2 cup cooked)
Grain.Dont: Refined flour products (white bread, pasta), Corn (in large quantities)

Legume.Do: Mung beans (1/2 cup cooked), Lentils (red, yellow - 1/2 cup cooked), Chickpeas (1/2 cup cooked)
Legume.Dont: Black beans, Kidney beans (can be heavier for Pitta)

Veg.Do: Cucumber (1 cup sliced), Zucchini (1 cup cooked), Broccoli (1 cup cooked), Asparagus (1 cup cooked), Sweet potato (1/2 cup cooked), Bell peppers (1 cup cooked)
Veg.Dont: Tomatoes (can be heating), Eggplant (can be heating), Radishes (can be heating), Onions (in excess), Garlic (in excess)

Spices.Do: Coriander (1 tsp), Cumin (1 tsp), Fennel (1 tsp), Cardamom (1/4 tsp), Turmeric (1/2 tsp)
Spices.Dont: Chili powder, Black pepper (in excess), Mustard seeds (in excess), Asafoetida (Hing - can be heating)

Leafy veg.Do: Spinach (1 cup cooked), Kale (1 cup cooked), Cilantro (1/4 cup chopped)

Oil.Do: Ghee (1 tsp), Coconut oil (1 tsp), Sunflower oil (1 tsp)
Oil.Dont: Sesame oil (in excess), Mustard oil (in excess)

Fruits.Do: Apples (1 medium, cooked or stewed), Pears (1 medium, cooked), Grapes (1 cup), Melons (1 cup), Berries (1/2 cup)
Fruits.Dont: Citrus fruits (lemons, limes - in excess), Pineapple (can be heating), Papaya (can be heating)

Nuts and Dry fruits.Dont: Pistachios (can be heating), Cashews (can be heating)

Milk product.Do: Yogurt (1/2 cup, diluted with water - Lassi), Buttermilk (1 cup)
Milk product.Dont: Hard cheeses, Sour cream, Full-fat milk (can be heavy)

Condiments.Do: Mint chutney (small amount), Coriander chutney (small amount), Coconut chutney (small amount)
